Minimum Duration Recommendations: ┌────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ • At least 1 full week (day-of-week) │ │ • At least 2 weeks for novelty decay │ │ • Include any business cycles │ │ • Account for delayed conversions │ └────────────────────────────────────────┘
Even if you have enough samples in 3 days, run for at least 1-2 weeks!
